long_description: Designed for watersports in harsh conditions but perfect for all terrain, the Julbo Swell polarized sunglasses keep eyes protected from the sun's rays. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Flash lens treatment creates a mirror effect, improving light filitration. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight nylon frame wraps close around the face for excellent peripheral protection. Adjustable, shockproof nose and temple pads become tacky as you perspire, further helping keep eyewear in place. Floating frame and adjustable neckcord greatly reduce the chance you'lll lose the Julbo Swell sunglasses while you're playing. Includes a protective hard case.
short_description: Designed for watersports in harsh conditions but perfect for all terrain, the Julbo Swell polarized sunglasses keep eyes protected from the sun's rays.
